verses.plain: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

tokens.t: And the
spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.plain: Speak unto the children of Israel, that they bring me an offering: of every man that giveth it willingly with his heart ye shall take my offering.

tokens.t: Speak unto the children of Israel, that they bring me an offering: of every man that giveth it willingly with his heart ye shall take my offering.

verses.plain: And this is the offering which ye shall take of them; gold, and silver, and brass,

tokens.t: And this
the offering which ye shall take of them; gold, and silver, and brass,

verses.plain: And blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats’ hair,

tokens.t: And blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats’

verses.plain: And rams’ skins dyed red, and badgers’ skins, and shittim wood,

tokens.t: And rams’ skins dyed red, and badgers’ skins, and shittim wood,

verses.plain: Oil for the light, spices for anointing oil, and for sweet incense,

tokens.t: Oil for the light, spices for anointing oil, and for sweet incense,

verses.plain: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.

tokens.t: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.

verses.plain: And let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.

tokens.t: And let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.

verses.plain: According to all that I shew thee, after the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the instruments thereof, even so shall ye make it.

tokens.t: According to all that I shew thee,
the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the instruments thereof, even so shall ye make

verses.plain: ¶ And they shall make an ark of shittim wood: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

tokens.t: ¶ And they shall make an ark
shittim wood: two cubits and a half
the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

verses.plain: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, within and without shalt thou overlay it, and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about.

tokens.t: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, within and without shalt thou overlay it, and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about.

verses.plain: And thou shalt cast four rings of gold for it, and put them in the four corners thereof; and two rings shall be in the one side of it, and two rings in the other side of it.

tokens.t: And thou shalt cast four rings of gold for it, and put
in the four corners thereof; and two rings
in the one side of it, and two rings in the other side of it.

verses.plain: And thou shalt make staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.

tokens.t: And thou shalt make staves
shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.

verses.plain: And thou shalt put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark, that the ark may be borne with them.

tokens.t: And thou shalt put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark, that the ark may be borne with them.

verses.plain: The staves shall be in the rings of the ark: they shall not be taken from it.

tokens.t: The staves shall be in the rings of the ark: they shall not be taken from it.

verses.plain: And thou shalt put into the ark the testimony which I shall give thee.

tokens.t: And thou shalt put into the ark the testimony which I shall give thee.

verses.plain: And thou shalt make a mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.

tokens.t: And thou shalt make a mercy seat
pure gold: two cubits and a half
the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.

verses.plain: And thou shalt make two cherubims of gold, of beaten work shalt thou make them, in the two ends of the mercy seat.

tokens.t: And thou shalt make two cherubims
gold,
beaten work shalt thou make them, in the two ends of the mercy seat.

verses.plain: And make one cherub on the one end, and the other cherub on the other end: even of the mercy seat shall ye make the cherubims on the two ends thereof.

tokens.t: And make one cherub on the one end, and the other cherub on the other end:
of the mercy seat shall ye make the cherubims on the two ends thereof.

verses.plain: And the cherubims shall stretch forth their wings on high, covering the mercy seat with their wings, and their faces shall look one to another; toward the mercy seat shall the faces of the cherubims be.

tokens.t: And the cherubims shall stretch forth
wings on high, covering the mercy seat with their wings, and their faces
one to another; toward the mercy seat shall the faces of the cherubims be.

verses.plain: And thou shalt put the mercy seat above upon the ark; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that I shall give thee.

tokens.t: And thou shalt put the mercy seat above upon the ark; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that I shall give thee.

verses.plain: And there I will meet with thee, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubims which are upon the ark of the testimony, of all things which I will give thee in commandment unto the children of Israel.

tokens.t: And there I will meet with thee, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubims which
upon the ark of the testimony, of all
which I will give thee in commandment unto the children of Israel.

verses.plain: ¶ Thou shalt also make a table of shittim wood: two cubits shall be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

tokens.t: ¶ Thou shalt also make a table
shittim wood: two cubits
the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

verses.plain: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, and make thereto a crown of gold round about.

tokens.t: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, and make thereto a crown of gold round about.

verses.plain: And thou shalt make unto it a border of an hand breadth round about, and thou shalt make a golden crown to the border thereof round about.

tokens.t: And thou shalt make unto it a border of an hand breadth round about, and thou shalt make a golden crown to the border thereof round about.

verses.plain: And thou shalt make for it four rings of gold, and put the rings in the four corners that are on the four feet thereof.

tokens.t: And thou shalt make for it four rings of gold, and put the rings in the four corners that
on the four feet thereof.

verses.plain: Over against the border shall the rings be for places of the staves to bear the table.

tokens.t: Over against the border shall the rings be for places of the staves to bear the table.

verses.plain: And thou shalt make the staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, that the table may be borne with them.

tokens.t: And thou shalt make the staves
shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, that the table may be borne with them.

verses.plain: And thou shalt make the dishes thereof, and spoons thereof, and covers thereof, and bowls thereof, to cover withal: of pure gold shalt thou make them.

tokens.t: And thou shalt make the dishes thereof, and spoons thereof, and covers thereof, and bowls thereof, to cover withal:
pure gold shalt thou make them.

verses.plain: And thou shalt set upon the table shewbread before me alway.

tokens.t: And thou shalt set upon the table shewbread before me alway.

verses.plain: ¶ And thou shalt make a candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work shall the candlestick be made: his shaft, and his branches, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, shall be of the same.

tokens.t: ¶ And thou shalt make a candlestick
pure gold:
beaten work shall the candlestick be made: his shaft, and his branches, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, shall be of the same.

verses.plain: And six branches shall come out of the sides of it; three branches of the candlestick out of the one side, and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side:

tokens.t: And six branches shall come out of the sides of it; three branches of the candlestick out of the one side, and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side:

verses.plain: Three bowls made like unto almonds, with a knop and a flower in one branch; and three bowls made like almonds in the other branch, with a knop and a flower: so in the six branches that come out of the candlestick.

tokens.t: Three bowls made like unto almonds,
a knop and a flower in one branch; and three bowls made like almonds in the other branch,
a knop and a flower: so in the six branches that come out of the candlestick.

verses.plain: And in the candlestick shall be four bowls made like unto almonds, with their knops and their flowers.

tokens.t: And in the candlestick
four bowls made like unto almonds,
their knops and their flowers.

verses.plain: And there shall be a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, according to the six branches that proceed out of the candlestick.

tokens.t: And
a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, according to the six branches that proceed out of the candlestick.

verses.plain: Their knops and their branches shall be of the same: all it shall be one beaten work of pure gold.

tokens.t: Their knops and their branches shall be of the same: all it
one beaten work
pure gold.

verses.plain: And thou shalt make the seven lamps thereof: and they shall light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it.

tokens.t: And thou shalt make the seven lamps thereof: and they shall light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it.

verses.plain: And the tongs thereof, and the snuffdishes thereof, shall be of pure gold.

tokens.t: And the tongs thereof, and the snuffdishes thereof,
pure gold.

verses.plain: Of a talent of pure gold shall he make it, with all these vessels.

tokens.t: a talent of pure gold shall he make it, with all these vessels.

verses.plain: And look that thou make them after their pattern, which was shewed thee in the mount.

tokens.t: And look that thou make
after their pattern, which was shewed thee in the mount.

footnotes.text: bring me: Heb. take for me
of…: or, of the matter of the mercy seat
to…: or, to pour out withal
shall light: or, shall cause to ascend
it: Heb. the face of it
which…: Heb. which thou wast caused to see
